name: Edelrid Pika 9.8mm 40m Rope
description:
Simple and good for universal use. It's adequately beefy for sport and top roping, but light enough to pack around. Thermo treatment gives it an impressive strength rating and provides excellent handling during its lifetime.Thermo Shield treatment gives it excellent handling properties and supple feel.Each individual yarn is encased in a bonded protective coating to maximize overall strength.40m length for quick hit routes or alpine.

        Sustainability
